alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 08 at 7:51PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SHIAWASSEE AND GENESEE COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM EST... At 751 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Owosso, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Flint, Owosso, Flushing, Grand Blanc, Davison, Durand, Burton, Swartz Creek, Corunna, Mount Morris, Goodrich, Otisville, Bancroft, Lennon, Otter Lake, Gaines, Beecher, Crossroads Village, Genesee, and Atlas. This includes the following highways... I-75 between mile markers 108 and 127. I-475 between mile markers 1 and 16. I-69 between mile markers 109 and 148. US-23 between mile markers 86 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
